verses.verse: Indeed I will make (Rev. 2:9) those of the synagogue of Satan, who say they are Jews and are not, but lie—indeed (Is. 45:14; 49:23; 60:14) I will make them come and worship before your feet, and to know that I have loved you.

Because you have kept My command to persevere, (2 Tim. 2:12; 2 Pet. 2:9) I also will keep you from the hour of trial which shall come upon (Luke 2:1) the whole world, to test those who dwell (Is. 24:17) on the earth.
Behold, (Phil. 4:5) I am coming quickly! (Rev. 2:25) Hold fast what you have, that no one may take ((Rev. 2:10)) your crown.

He who overcomes, I will make him (1 Kin. 7:21; Jer. 1:18; Gal. 2:9) a pillar in the temple of My God, and he shall (Ps. 23:6) go out no more. ((Rev. 14:1; 22:4)) I will write on him the name of My God and the name of the city of My God, the ((Heb. 12:22)) New Jerusalem, which (Rev. 21:2) comes down out of heaven from My God. ((Rev. 2:17; 22:4)) And I will write on him My new name.
(Rev. 2:7) “He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches.” ’

(The Lukewarm Church) “And to the angel of the church of the Laodiceans write, (Is. 65:16; 2 Cor. 1:20) ‘These things says the Amen, (Rev. 1:5; 3:7; 19:11) the Faithful and True Witness, ((Col. 1:15)) the Beginning of the creation of God:
(Rev. 3:1) “I know your works, that you are neither cold nor hot. I could wish you were cold or hot.
So then, because you are lukewarm, and neither cold nor hot, I will vomit you out of My mouth.
Because you say, (Hos. 12:8; Zech. 11:5; (Matt. 5:3); 1 Cor. 4:8) ‘I am rich, have become wealthy, and have need of nothing’—and do not know that you are wretched, miserable, poor, blind, and naked—

I counsel you (Is. 55:1; Matt. 13:44) to buy from Me gold refined in the fire, that you may be rich; and (2 Cor. 5:3) white garments, that you may be clothed, that the shame of your nakedness may not be revealed; and anoint your eyes with eye salve, that you may see.
(Job 5:17) As many as I love, I rebuke and (Prov. 3:12; (2 Cor. 11:32); Heb. 12:6) chasten. Therefore be zealous and repent.
